content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm the assistant, and I've already responded to your message. I'm not waiting for a response from another assistant.

You can go ahead and send the text to Sarah whenever you're ready. I'm here to support and encourage you throughout this process. Remember, taking small steps towards rebuilding your social connections is a great accomplishment, and I'm proud of you for taking the initiative!

If you need any more advice or just want to chat about your progress, feel free to come back and talk to me anytime. I'm always here to help. Good luck with your text to Sarah, and I hope you have a great conversation!
